Subject: Re: The Battle
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

As Menasor was heading up to Astroblast, he heard the one Maximal threaten
him, as he looked back long enough he saw a grenade heading for him.
Quickly out of reflex he brought his good arm up to block it, and
unfortunately, Firearm got in the way, (Yanshosh, I guess you might want to
post damage for the grenade), the then saw the new Gestalt fly towards him.
A missile hit its mark, blasting him in the chest, leaving a charred
remain. He tried to bring up his arm to block another, but the arm was to
damaged from his attempt to pick up Firearm, so another went to his leg,
grazing it. He managed to dodge on more, and put Firearm in the way of
another again, (again Yanshosh you can post damage). He then looked at his
flying foe, "Menasor.... Say you stupid, and hurt Maximal more than you do
me", he then continued towards Astroblast.
